speaker: Customer
text: No, this is Sarah. Who is this?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling from XYZ Collections regarding some outstanding debt connected to your account.

speaker: Customer
text: I think you've got the wrong person. I don’t have any accounts with you.

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the mix-up. I will update our records to reflect this.

speaker: Agent
text: Of course! Have a great day.
